name: Love in the Limelight - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This DLC includes the complete Soundtrack for the Love in the Limelight game.

Including the main theme song with jpop singer, plus an instrumental version.
As well as the full 50 track list included in the game.

Track-list;
  • 1. LitL Theme Song
  • 2. LitL Theme Song Instrumental
  • 3. Main Theme 1
  • 4. Getting Playful
  • 5. Tender Moments
  • 6. Playful Moment
  • 7. The Weird Girl
  • 8. Sleepy Time
  • 9. When You're Down
  • 10. Come with me
  • 11. Day out with a Girl
  • 12. Lively Outdoors
  • 13. Mall Outing

  • 15. Main Theme

  • 22. Meloncholic Encounter
  • 23. Weird Girl

  • 26. Persistent Girl
  • 27. Happy End
  • 28. Upbeat
  • 29. Morning Run
  • 30. Divine Love
  • 31. Natural High
  • 32. Another Date
  • 33. Cheeky Girl
  • 34. Heaven

  • 38. Challenge Time!
  • 39. Dream Away

  • 45. Nice Day

  • 51. Touch

short_description: The complete music track for My Girlfriend, includes the original jpop theme song, instrumental version and the 50 songs that make up the music of Love in the Limelight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
